Key Match Events: Ismaël Koné scored a goal to tie the match for Canada
Luis Suárez scored an equalizer to send the match straight to penalties
Post-Match Reflections: It was a disappointing end to a memorable few weeks for Jesse Marsch and Canada
The Canadians looked stunned at what had unfolded
Miscellaneous Highlights: Canada battled back and eventually tied things up in the 22nd minute
Uruguay pushed hard for an equalizer, and St. Clair made a huge save in stoppage time to keep Canada’s lead intact
Others: Canada had a decent start in the first few moments of the match
By starting a rotated side, making six changes from the semifinal defeat to Argentina, Jesse Marsch was able to bring some heavy hitters off the bench against a tiring Uruguayan side
